amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to include an insurance industry deductible of $5 billion, require terrorism coverage as part of commercial property and casualty insurance, and specify no limits on tort actions or recoveries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaFalce amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 197 - 222 (Roll no. 462).
